projects.name: Passenger I
projects.technologies: Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, wagger

projects.name: Food Buster
projects.description: Food management application that use AI to calculate amount of food left in the plate and track user score. the objective of this project is to reduce food waste and reduce C02
projects.technologies: Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, wagger

projects.name: Passenger II
projects.description: High-altitude Balloon research project. This project is created to research air quality and weather condition in the upper atmosphere.

projects.name: SPOROS
projects.description: 3rd place in Anual Cansat Competition 2021. This project is a satellite that can deploy without parachute. Communication is done by using LoRa and Container is used as a Communication hub.

projects.name: ALIENSAT
projects.description: 1st place in Thailand Cansat Competition 2021. This project is a satellite that can detect and track air pollution by using thermal camera.

projects.name: Asclepius
projects.description: Won first place in Microsoft APAC hackathon 2021. This project is a web application that allows users to translate American Sign Language (ASL) to text and vice versa. It also allows users to search for medical terms and their definitions.

projects.name: Safetybelt
projects.description: Thai vivat innovation award 2021. This project use AI to detect fall and inflate airbag to protect the user.
projects.technologies: Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, wagger
